name: NSCalendar.Unit
desc: Calendrical units such as year, month, day and hour.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new calendar unit from the raw value.

items.name: static var yearForWeekOfYear: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the week-counting year unit.

items.name: static var quarter: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the quarter of the calendar.

items.name: static var weekOfYear: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the week of the year calendar unit.

items.name: static var weekOfMonth: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the week of the month calendar unit.

items.name: static var weekdayOrdinal: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the ordinal weekday unit.

items.name: static var calendar: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the calendar of a date components object.

items.name: static var timeZone: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Identifier for the time zone of a date components object.
